rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0001
rows.name:
Tora and friends should go
to Cole's theater!

rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0004
rows.name: I knew you two were up to something.

rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0005
rows.name:
That right! Play about interesting story
Tora hear from local littlepon!

rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0006
rows.name:
Boss should come and see
our little show!

rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0008
rows.name:
Also, Tora have little request
for Nia too.

rows.label: kizunainn020_msg0011
rows.name: Well, why don't we go and take a look?
